alert.note: Alert for Harper; Kingman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:26AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Harper and southwestern Kingman Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 326 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nashville, or 9 miles north of Sharon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Attica, Nashville, Willowdale, Zenda, Spivey, Rago and Crystal Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
